message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Alice,  $20000 is way out of my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go above $8000.  This is my absolute maximum.  Let me know if you're willing to consider that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8000 is a significant amount for you, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $12000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value and rarity.
